description: {"blocks":[{"key":"63lel","text":"This is a protocol to perform RNA fluorescent in situ hybridization (RNA-FISH) using hybridization chain reaction (HCR) on whole-mount samples of the brains of the fly Drosophila melanogaster and other insects, e.g. the jumping ant Harpegnathos saltator. Probes and HCR reagents are purchased from Molecular Instruments. This protocol is loosely based on the \"generic sample in solution\" protocol published by Molecular Instruments. Our modifications include the description of fixation conditions, counterstaining by Hoechst, and altered washes. Additionally, we use larger concentrations of probes and hairpins following the protocol described by Younger, Herre et al. 2020. We have successfully employed this protocol to stain insect brains with up to 4 different probe sets simultaneously (hairpins conjugated with Alexa Fluor 488, 546, 496, and 647).","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":168,"length":23},{"style":"italic","offset":232,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":298,"length":21},{"key":1,"offset":359,"length":72},{"key":2,"offset":795,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rg11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kevi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9i7h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"709B94A036A911ECBD30851F7CBC6798","url":"https://www.molecularinstruments.com/"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"07BE124036AA11ECBD30851F7CBC6798","url":"https://files.molecularinstruments.com/MI-Protocol-RNAFISH-GenericSolution-Rev7.pdf"}},"2":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"authors":"Meg A. Younger, Margaret Herre, Alison R. Ehrlich, Zhongyan Gong, Zachary N. Gilbert, Saher Rahiel, Benjamin J. Matthews, Leslie B. Vosshall","can_edit":1,"date":"1604877540","doi":"https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.11.07.368720","guid":"49613CBE341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"bioRxiv","protocol_id":null,"title":"Non-canonical odor coding ensures unbreakable mosquito attraction to humans"}},"3":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"authors":"Meg A. Younger, Margaret Herre, Alison R. Ehrlich, Zhongyan Gong, Zachary N. Gilbert, Saher Rahiel, Benjamin J. Matthews, Leslie B. Vosshall","can_edit":1,"date":"1604877540","doi":"https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.11.07.368720","guid":"49613CBE341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"bioRxiv","protocol_id":null,"title":"Non-canonical odor coding ensures unbreakable mosquito attraction to humans"}}}}

fork_info.title: HCR RNA-FISH protocol for the whole-mount brains of Drosophila and other insects

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"8jdji","text":"WORKING PRACTICES:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6ba1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s4bn","text":"Prepare all buffers using nuclease-free water. Use filter tips and nuclease-free tubes. If using spot plates, pre-clean them first with household bleach diluted 1:10 in water and then with 70% ethanol. Wear gloves and adhere to other practices aimed at minimizing RNA degradation in the sample. Working in a clean bench is not required if other RNAse-free practice are followed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu1cl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hjh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74r34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dffht","text":"PROBE DESIGN:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7j4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2d2nl","text":"We select the target sequence or isoform of the gene of interest and let Molecular Instruments design the probes. For genes with multiple isoforms, either target the isoform that includes as many as possible constitutive exons and as few as possible alternatively spliced exons, or the isoform that has the highest RNA-seq coverage (assessed visually in IGV) if RNA-seq data are available. Aim for the highest number of probes in a set, ideally 40, although we have successfully performed experiments with probe sets containing \u003c20 probes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69l1b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50m9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e29nl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn5om","text":"AMPLIFIER CHOICE:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5et1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v0dr","text":"We routinely perform multiplexed stainings with up to 4 different probe sets and a Hoechst counterstain. We use amplifiers conjugated with Alexa Fluor 488, 546, 594, and 647. We are able to detect clearly distinguishable signals with minimal bleed-through on our confocal microscope (Leica SP8). However, be aware that simultaneously using fluorophores with partially overlapping spectra (e.g. AF 546 and 594) requires setting narrower detection ranges, which reduces the amount of signal detected.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7kq5g","text":"Prepare separately each hairpin (h1 and h2) of each amplifier. {"blocks":[{"key":"br2cr","text":"If not using DAPI, skip this step and the next and proceed to step 28.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76jg2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bg63","text":"If using DAPI: incubate samples with 150 μL of SSCT + DAPI (1:1000 of the 5 mg/mL stock - final concentration 10 μg/mL) for 1 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd4lc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b96g4","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cu2ou","text":"  or   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"8FC3FF5036B511ECBD30851F7CBC6798","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B6023683369611EC8E100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C02AA4EC369B11EC8E100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Nutator","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"24","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"3":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C02AA64F369B11EC8E100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Orbital shaker","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"60","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bus6l","text":"Wash 2 x 10 min with 150 μL of 5X SSCT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97f0m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fttqf","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76lon","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4oslk","text":"  or   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9FABCE2036B511ECBD30851F7CBC6798","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"1E4DC45031C711EE9B8E09488813D6A0","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E566C40D369611EC8E100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C233A64D369B11EC8E100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Nutator","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"24","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"4":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C233A7EA369B11EC8E100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Orbital shaker","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"60","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ur3d","text":"Rinse with 2X Nuclease-Free PBS to remove the detergent","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6r9dm","text":"Remove the PBS and add Slowfade (or another antifade mountant)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7r512","text":"If necessary, finish dissecting to remove extra tissue. Mount brains on slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jmq6","text":"All the next steps are light sensitive and must be done in the dark!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":68}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ao1hq","text":"Proceed with imaging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39uag","text":"Wash samples 2 × 5min with 1mL of 5X SSCT at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jsog","text":"  5x SSCT ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7sjhh","text":"  5x SSCT ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cm6vp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"A62ADB00318211EE9B8E09488813D6A0","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"ADAD0150318211EE9B8E09488813D6A0","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ffo2n","text":"During sample equilibration, warm up the thermo cycler to 95°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu97s","text":"Prepare 1.2 ml/sample 5X SSCT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26upj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
